Class ec.ezlib.base.TextComponentSugar 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ezlib.base.TextComponentSugar
public class TextComponentSugar
extends Object
A sweetener defining extra messages that may be e-sent to a TextComponentReader.

OTHER_TYPE

getCaretPosition(TextComponent)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.
getSelectedText(TextComponent)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.
getSelectionEnd(TextComponent)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.
getSelectionStart(TextComponent)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.
getText(TextComponent)
Workaround the workaround inserted by setText() above.
select(TextComponent, int, int)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where setting an empty selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.
setText(TextComponent, String)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where there's a dead zone within fudge1() characters of the end of the text.

OTHER_TYPE 
 public static final Class OTHER_TYPE

getCaretPosition 
 public static int getCaretPosition(TextComponent rec)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position. XXX this workaround must be removed when the bug is fixed!

getSelectionStart 
 public static int getSelectionStart(TextComponent rec)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position. XXX this workaround must be removed when the bug is fixed!

getSelectionEnd 
 public static int getSelectionEnd(TextComponent rec)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position. XXX this workaround must be removed when the bug is fixed!

getSelectedText 
 public static String getSelectedText(TextComponent rec)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where the reported selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.

select 
 public static void select(TextComponent rec,
                           int start,
                           int end)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where setting an empty selection seems off by the number of lines before this position.

setText 
 public static void setText(TextComponent rec,
                            String str)
Work around peculiar AWT bug where there's a dead zone within fudge1() characters of the end of the text.

getText 
 public static String getText(TextComponent rec)
Workaround the workaround inserted by setText() above.
